name: wbgcode
description: GIG by WeBeGiggin' is a comprehensive platform designed to support the gig economy by fostering a community of gig workers, freelancers, contractors, startup founders, business owners, and admins who share a common interest in the gig economy. This platform offers a robust UI where users can manage profiles, search for gig opportunities, and connect with other members of the gig economy. Admins can oversee operations, ensuring a smooth and secure experience for all users. The platform's focus is to provide tools and resources that empower gig workers to thrive in their careers, whether they're looking to land short-term projects or build long-term client relationships.
author: Reece Ballard rballard.r2@gmail.com, Kathareeya Atthajaroon Kmiyoki@gmail.com
